external_games.name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book II

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book II
summary: In the finale of Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons, become Tsubasa one last time and begin an epic journey spanning time and space while uncovering some of largest secrets of the Mystic Destinies universe.
